name: Tucan Hero
description:
IMPORTANT: the web build sometimes crashes the browser. Until I fixed the bug, please use the download option if possible. Thx!

Submission to the GBJAM9.

Play as a little Tucan and fight your way through procedurally generated dungeons with strange enemies like ghosts, moving bombs and frightful llamas.

Collect keys to open chests and locked doors and find the boss as a final challenge.

  • Move with D-Pad, WASD or arrow keys
  • Shoot with A , B, CTRL
  • Show the Minmap with SELECT or TAB
